creator: Andrew Asmakov
title: South Korean Authorities Say Terraform Labs CEO Do Kwon in Serbia: Report
dc:creator: Andrew Asmakov
content: South Korean authorities indicate that Terra's Do Kwon, also wanted by Interpol, moved to Serbia but could now be in a neighboring country.
contentSnippet: South Korean authorities indicate that Terra's Do Kwon, also wanted by Interpol, moved to Serbia but could now be in a neighboring country.

creator: 陳品 Ping Chen
title: 陳品｜談區塊鏈資安：安全的錯覺，輕薄的假象
dc:creator: 陳品 Ping Chen
content:
所謂的安全其實是由許許多多的前提和假設堆疊出來，身為區塊鏈使用者，了解的越多，就越不需要靠膚淺的表象來得到錯誤 […]

〈陳品｜談區塊鏈資安：安全的錯覺，輕薄的假象〉這篇文章最早發佈於動區BlockTempo《動區動趨-最具影響力的區塊鏈媒體 (比特幣, 加密貨幣)》。
